attributes.description: At Kia Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Conditional report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace.
